attributes.action: To stop large faceless organisations try and take control of small business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please phone me on 01769 581391
Thanks
I think you are much better than Tony Blair and that David Guy but I was a Tory before but Tony was not a person for the people he was a person for himself. Another annoyance is goverment bodies take 10 days plus sometimes to resond if you are a small business or an international bank you could be bankrupt by then- Not a bank of course because they will keep all the money you give them. This site is crap

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.Your petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
You should not include your phone number in the petition.
Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
